name: Quadra
overview: Quadra is a four-dimensional Tic-Tac-Toe/Noughts and Crosses game for 1 or 2 players developed by John Bettels and published in Magic Disk 64 1990/09. Try to line up four stones on the four levels with the joystick and in front of your opponent (human or computer!) Vertically, horizontally, up, down, diagonally or in any other way - but don't let the wonderfully weird music confuse you.
